CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1946. pg. 3, reads: "Plan Confab with Mayor - Following a mass meeting at Tabernacle Baptist Church Tuesday evening the group above was appointed by members of the North Side Citizens' Committee to confer with Mayor David Lawrence concerning an anti-Klan ordinance. Left to right, are: the Rev. Mr. Dandridge, James McCoy and Anna Devonich.  The North Side Citizens' Committee is one of the latest organizations to join the fight against intolerance in America. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Rev. Dandridge, Anna Devonich, and James McCoy, standing in Tabernacle Baptist Church
